sentences.en: Bonds between adjacent atoms contribute more significantly than bonds between nonadjacent atoms.
sentences.cn: 相邻原子间的键比不相邻原子间的贡献大.

sentences.en: Channels generally contain coarser sediment than do the adjacent flood plains.
sentences.cn: 河床沉积物一般比邻近的泛滥平原沉积物粗些.

sentences.en: Each ecosystem, however, is continuous to some degree with adjacent systems.
sentences.cn: 然而, 每个生态系统在某种程度上都和邻近的系统是连续的.

sentences.en: He sat in an adjacent room and waited.
sentences.cn: 他坐在隔壁房间里等候。

sentences.en: Newly - synthesized DNA strands from adjacent replicons are ligated together.
sentences.cn: 来自邻近的复制子的新合成的DNA链又连结在一起.

sentences.en: The adjacent apartment block screened the high wall of the dunes.
sentences.cn: 附近的那座公寓大楼遮蔽了沙丘的那道高墙.

sentences.en: the building adjacent to the library
The house adjacent to ours is under repairs.
sentences.cn: 与我家相邻的房子正在修缮.

sentences.en: The planes landed on adjacent runways.
sentences.cn: 这些飞机在毗连的跑道上降落。

sentences.en: The schools were adjacent but there were separate doors.
sentences.cn: 这些学校紧挨着，但各自独门独户。

sentences.en: These young students live in adjacent rooms.
sentences.cn: 这些年轻的学生住在毗连的房间里.

sentences.en: They complained that they had been trapped inside the police station, but in fact most were seen escaping over the adjacent roofs to safety in nearby buildings.
sentences.cn: 他们抱怨说被困在了警察局里，但实际上，有人看见他们大多数人通过毗邻的屋顶，安全地逃到了附近的建筑物内。

sentences.en: They may grow so large as to compress adjacent viscera.
sentences.cn: 它们可能长得很大而压迫临近脏器.

sentences.en: This innervate the adjacent region of the fore and middle intestine.
sentences.cn: 这就为前肠和中肠的邻接部分提供了神经.

sentences.en: Those patients who were up to it could move to the adjacent pool.
sentences.cn: 身体状况允许的病人可去隔壁的游泳池。
我们住在毗连的房间里。
我们在毗邻的房间里工作.

trans.tran_en: a room, building, piece of land etc that is adjacent to something is next to it
